component.name: Resonance
component.summary: A clean and minimal API client

description.p: Resonance is a clean and minimal API client application designed to provide an excellent user experience for testing and interacting with APIs. Built with Electron, it offers a modern and intuitive interface for developers.

ul.li: OpenAPI/Swagger collection imports - Import OpenAPI 3.0 specifications in YAML or JSON format
Variable templating system - Use template variables with {{ variableName }} syntax for API keys, base URLs, and more
Multiple HTTP methods - Support for GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and PATCH requests
Request body schema generation - Automatically generate example request bodies from OpenAPI schemas
Clean, organized interface - Split layout with collections sidebar and tabbed request/response sections
Theme support - Light, dark, system, and blueprint themes with CSS custom properties
Multi-language support - Available in English, German, Spanish, French, and Italian
Secure architecture - Built with context isolation and secure IPC communication
